channel.title: Disabling magic on players outside the wilderness delta 317
channel.description:
ok so i have it down to not being able to attack players out side of the wilderness except if you click cast on a spell then use it on a player it will still attack them.
how can i fix this?
also my skill's dont respawn like health dosent go back up unless you re log

item.title: Disabling magic on players outside the wilderness delta 317
item.dc:creator: @lilmanx lilmanx
item.description:
@lilmanx wrote:

it dident work do you have team viewer?

Read full topic
item.source: Disabling magic on players outside the wilderness delta 317

item.title: Disabling magic on players outside the wilderness delta 317
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

Well, find your wilderness code (stating if player is in wild), and do what I said above.

Here is a little bit of knowledge.

if you return a void/boolean in the beginning of the code, outside of all the other if blocks, the code (if the if statement you just returned is true) will prevent the rest of the code from happening. here is an example

[code]
public int int1 = 0;
public int int2 = 0;
public boolean bool1 = false;

public void someCodeHere(){
if (bool1 == false)
return;
if (int1 >= 5){
int1++;
int2 = 5;
}
}

[code]

same goes with booleans, just have to return it false.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Disabling magic on players outside the wilderness delta 317

item.title: Disabling magic on players outside the wilderness delta 317
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“lilmanx, post:3, topic:452459”]ill look at it, this is what i have so that you cant attack npc’s with magic

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].HP == 0) {
server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].IsUnderAttack = false;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage(“You cannot attack this NPC!”);
return;
}[/quote]

Basically the same code, only with player vs player combat.

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling magic on players outside the wilderness delta 317
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

not sure if this will work completely, but find the magic on player void/boolean and try something like so.

note: paste this in the top of the boolean/void.

if (!Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].inWild()){
c.sendMessage("You can't attack a player that isn't in the wild.");
return;
}

Not sure if that will work with your server, you might have to convert it

if boolean, use return false.

Read full topic
